item.description: Ridgefield Liberty Cooperative Is Sponsoring a Meeting at the Ridgefield Town Hall Thursday, December 1, 2011, at 7:00 PM ______________________________________________________________________________ Do you know what the Republican presidential hopefuls stand for? We are Ron Paul supporters and we are eager to answer your questions about him. We would love to hear what you have to say about any of the candidates Who is Ron Paul? Who is Herman Cain? Are there other candidates that intrigue you? No matter who you support, come to share and learn. Follow this link to see our appearance on the Marty Heiser Show discussing the event (Nov. 9 Broadcast) http://iawab.blogspot... Refreshments will be served. Email your questions to: wrcostello@sbcglobal.net; barbcostello@sbcglobal.net; kwv817@yahoo.com; orrsl@danburylaw.com. For information on our previous programs, please visit our web site here http://ridgefieldlibe.... We hope to see you December 1.
item.name: Who is Ron Paul?
